.method public hidebysig virtual instance object GetPattern(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface patternInterface) cil managed

Docs.param: An enumeration value that specifies the control pattern.
Docs.summary: Returns the object that supports the specified control pattern of the element that is associated with this automation peer.
Docs.returns: The current object, if is a supported value; otherwise, . For more information, see Remarks.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> object.
- `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridItemAutomationPeer> is read-only.
- `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellAutomationPeer> can be selected.
- `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.
- `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.
